vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
BEP20NS (BEP20.sol#185-188) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (BEP20.sol#186)
	-transferFrom (BEP20.sol#187)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
NonStandardToken (BEP20.sol#240-276) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (BEP20.sol#258-262)
	-transferFrom (BEP20.sol#264-269)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function harnessSetFailTransferFromAddress(address src, bool _fail) public {

        failTransferFromAddresses[src] = _fail;
vulnerability_findings.message: BEP20Harness.harnessSetFailTransferFromAddress (BEP20.sol#288-290) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function harnessSetFailTransferToAddress(address dst, bool _fail) public {

        failTransferToAddresses[dst] = _fail;
vulnerability_findings.message: BEP20Harness.harnessSetFailTransferToAddress (BEP20.sol#292-294) should be declared external
